Application                                  
                
R/Sir,
                     Currently, I am working in M/s Arvind Mill Ahmedabad as 
a knitting Manufacturing  manager. Where my responsibilities includes 
to Production Operation with quality parameter against customer 
requirement, but I would like to change my job in order to gain 
additional experience as to my general preparedness. My resume has 
been enclosed herewith for your kind consideration.
                     I hope you will provide me this opportunity to prove my 
worth and efficiency.
                                                                                               Thanking 
you
                                                                                               Sumit 
Thakur

Work Experience-
Total Experience 3 year  in textile platform.
Currently Working in  M/s. Arvind Mill as a Knitting Manufacturing 
Manager since Aug 2015 to till date)
Previously Worked in M/s. Fashion gauge knitwear Industries . as a  
Production and quality control Dept (knitting    division) .
 Jobs title history. Profile & Responsibility-
Get production plan from PPC Dept and review the plan 
according to knit m/c assignment, yarn availability and no. of day
to knit the fabric.
Review m/c setting and m/c availability according required 
quality.  
Prepare the manpower availability in running the planed m/c.
Review Plan for m/c efficiency and productivity and over time 
hours according to delivery date.
Handling outsourcing
Making MIS report & reporting to MIS dept.
Holding profit, loss meeting with the seniors in month of last.
Conducting supervisors meeting for improvement of production 
efficiency with quality.
Maintaining m/c Maintenance schedule and machine setting.
Follow up IMS audit activity with documentation and 
presentation.Keeping Co-ordination with P.P.C.Dept. for timely delivery of 
product.
Follow up fabric complaint received from our process house & 
taking necessary action for trouble shooting. 
Monitoring fabric quality , Maintains activity and product 
development as per costumer 
Shade Matching of Dyed fabric & yarn dyed & mélange yarn with 
approved shade Cutting & give approval for proceeding.
Problematic fabrics inspect & give final grade for dispatch.           
Preparing all report and reporting to Higher Authority 
We subscribe to the knitting of the needles ,sinkers,cylinder  
Groz beckert.
 
  Strengths-
Achievement oriented, with technical skills and an ability to manage 
the situation with 
  Ease, working in organization as team to achieve its objectives.
  
  Technical Proficiency
Technical proficiency in knitting .
 General knowledge of  knitting socks machine, flat bed,  Maintenance 
or Spinning, & finishing
 Basic knowledge in computer
Extra  achievement--------     1.   Socks  knitting  machine
Designing course  completed
